passives.name: Shield Subverter Extension
passives.desc:
When using Shield Subverter:
 â€¢ Increases BRV based on MAX BRV before  PG attack
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 â€¢ Slight boost to BRV Damage Resistã€? DEF Upã€? moderate boost to Elude effects from Mnejing's Tactics
 â€¢ Moderate Automaton boost

When using BRV Attack+ (Fine-Tuning):
 â€¢ Slight boost to BRV granted to allies
 â€¢ Slight boost to BRV Damage Resistã€? DEF Upã€? moderate boost to Elude effects from Fine-Tuning
 â€¢ Extends active Mnejing's Tactics duration 1 turn
 â€¢ Extends allies' active Automaton duration 1 turn
